attributes.action: Abolish the BBC License Fee and make the BBC a subscription only service.
attributes.background: The BBC has ceased to be an impartial broadcaster and has breached it's own guidelines by supporting the Labour Party with a blatant disregard for the viewing public. Such a leftist leaning organisation should be a subscription only service for viewers who share the BBC's political ideology.

rejection.details:
This petition is similar to yours:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/179823
